name: My Bridge Score
description:
Now you can use your smart phone to keep your private scores while playing duplicate bridge, plus you can measure your success with the various partners with whom you play.

Supports Mitchell, relay/bystand and most Howell duplicate bridge movements included in popular bridge scoring applications. Data is kept in a database for later review and for entering the percentage achieved and master points earned at the end of each session. You can review past games and see how well you did with each of your partners. The partner edit screen shows the number of times you have played together, the average percentage achieved, and the total number of points earned in each color category.
